description:
Barsburg Empire's Military Academy is known for training elites who bring victory to the empire. Students of the academy freely utilize an ability called "Zaiphon" to fight, while the types of Zaiphon usable depends on the nature of the soldier.

Teito Klein, a student at the academy, is one of the most promising soldiers produced. Although ridiculed by everyone for being a sklave (German for slave) with no memories of his past, he is befriended by a fellow student called Mikage. While preparing for the final exam, Teito uncovers a dark secret related to his past. When an attempt to assassinate Ayanami, a high-ranking official who killed his father, fails, Teito is locked away awaiting punishment.

Only wanting the best for Teito, Mikage helps him escape. Teito ends up at the 7th District Church where he is taken in by the bishops. It is here that Teito attempts to evade the grasp of Ayanami and the Military, so he can rediscover his memories and learn why he is the person that can change the fate of the world.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

Has a hamster.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mirumodake)

After graduating from an animation school she was working on many productions for Yumeta Company and Studio Deen.

Married to [Tetsuya Yanagisawa](https://anilist.co/staff/109785/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mirumodake)

After graduating from an animation school she was working on many productions for Yumeta Company and Studio Deen.

Married to [Tetsuya Yanagisawa](https://anilist.co/staff/109785/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/quarter_law) | [Profile](http://www.undecided.co.jp/profile.html) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E5%B7%9D%E5%B9%B8%E5%A4%AA%E9%83%8E)

Japanese composer and arranger. He graduated from Tokyo University of the Arts' school of music. He is the son of musician and trumpet player Yoshihiro Nakagawa and older brother of the trombonist [Eijirou Nakagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/271401/Eijirou-Nakagawa). He has done music for various anime, dramas, films, and tokusatsu shows.

Nakagawa is known for collaborating with director [Gorou Taniguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/98066/Gorou-Taniguchi), and has written and composed the scores for many of his projects since [s-CRY-ed](https://anilist.co/anime/168/sCRYed/) in 2001. Including the acclaimed [Code Geass](https://anilist.co/anime/1575/Code-Geass-Lelouch-of-the-Rebellion/) series. Outside anime, he is also noted for his work on many Super Sentai and Kamen Rider series.

**Notable works outside anime as composer:**
~!- Hyakujuu Sentai Gaoranger (tokusatsu, TV series, 2001)
- GoGo Sentai Boukenger (tokusatsu, TV series, 2006)
- Kamen Rider Decade (tokusatsu, TV series, 2009) (with Shuuhei Naruse)
- Kamen Rider W (tokusatsu, TV series, 2009-10) (with Shuuhei Naruse)
- Kamen Rider OOO (tokusatsu, TV series, 2010) 
- Kamen Rider Wizard (tokusatsu, TV series, 2012-13)
- Kamen Rider Drive (tokusatsu, TV series, 2014) (with Shuuhei Naruse)
- Kamen Rider Revice (tokusatsu, TV series, 2021)!~

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/258364/)._

Affiliated with [Studio DEEN](https://anilist.co/studio/37/Studio-DEEN).

She seems to have retired somewhere around 2010.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/142747)._
